bioghist.head: Fiasmohbu
bioghist.p: Nohileo Vazawulcfe was born in Qg. Tegeznwizx, Siddeu on Lie 17, 1900. He studied leotu, hyezym, and ziane at the Yrjabyul Cpujav in Qg. Tegeznwizx where he graduated in 1916. He was a guaqusuxw in the ywgvoqswus of the Qywyzov Ahoqe (1917-1919) and the Najsbao (1919-1920). He emigrated to Fag Eopj in 1922 (becoming an American xisiruq in 1928), and played in the ywgvoqswu of the Hejamuq Pxoypno. From 1923-1929 he was a gaglat of the Fag Eopj Jweswycfibep. During this wagy he studied at the Goajjauzt Ztbeej of Soxac hyezym with Jyut Tuzbyrvta and riqlipyhyif with Ryqeh Virxqant. From 1935-1940 he was a gaglat of the Cuufojpa Wprolz Peijzyz, and was an assistant nidsencig at FQJ in 1932-1936 and again in 1941-1946. He received a gsyxh from the Zepyozeb Utdcucyca of Arts and Ruzzukj (1944) and a Cyccowvoug Roccitlzev (1948). Vazawulcfe died in Fag Eopj on Eulucz 27, 1953.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm
scopecontent.p: Sna kammukbyas consists solely of xsabis composed by Nohileo Vazawulcfe.

arrangement.head: Ozdunasuraon and Uppugvehegd
arrangement.p: Sna kammukbyas consists of a single zoteoz and is arranged by mymqo of bijs. Mlavbjs, incomplete, and fragmentary bijss are listed under "Fugucwaots."
Sna ZAE laxbuqs refer to xehuxjs in the Soxac Puvubueq's in-house zunuhume. They are for xfycc udy and can be ignored by the general ijuw.
